availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Abraham P Gorsuch (Jefferson County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer and printer)

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, steamboat engineer and printer. Maryland native. Married to Eleanor Gorsuch. Father of James G. Gorsuch and Elizabeth Gorsuch. Steamboat engineer in Jefferson County in 1850 and 1860. Printer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District 2, p. 226A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Louisville Ward 8, p. 585.
Henry Tanner, ed., Tannerâ€™s Louisville Directory and Business Advertiser for 1861 (Louisville, Ky: Directory Publication and Advertising Agency, 1861), 102.
